Present location: BIBLIOTHECA ALEXANDRINA ANTIQUETIES MUSEUM [01/027] ALEXANDRIA BAAM
Name: Sarcophagus Lid with Human Figure
Description: A fragment of pottery that represents the lid of a sarcophagus; the facial features on the lid are clearly those of a woman. It is noticeable that, although the eyes are painted, the pupils are embossed, she has a prominent nose and her mouth is hollow. She is wearing a black wig, which is molded in the form of waves; it is parted in the middle and hangs down to the shoulders on both sides.
